Shelly.desc: Shellyâ€™s spread-fire shotgun blasts the other team with buckshot. Her Super destroys cover and keeps her opponents at a distance!

attack.name: Buckshot
attack.desc: Shelly's boomstick fires a wide spread of pellets to a medium range. The more pellets hit, the greater the damage.

ult.name: Super Shell
ult.desc: Shelly's Super Shell obliterates both cover and enemies. Any survivors get knocked back.

sp1.name: Shell Shock
sp1.desc: Shelly's Super shells slow down enemies for 3.0 seconds!

sp2.name: Band-Aid
sp2.desc: When Shelly falls below 40% health, she instantly heals for 1800 health. Band-Aid recharges in 20.0 seconds.

Nita.desc: Nita strikes her enemies with a thunderous shockwave. Her Super summons a massive bear to fight by her side!

attack.name: Rupture
attack.desc: Nita sends forth a shockwave, damaging enemies caught in the tremor.

ult.name: Overbearing
ult.desc: Nita summons the spirit of Big Baby Bear to hunt down her enemies.

sp1.name: Bear with Me
sp1.desc: Nita recovers 500 health whenever her bear hits an enemy. When Nita deals damage, her bear regains 500 health.

sp2.name: Happy Bear
sp2.desc: Nita's bear attacks faster. Time between swipes is reduced by 60%.

Colt.desc: Colt fires an accurate burst of bullets from his dual revolvers. His Super shreds cover and extends the bullet barrage!

attack.name: Six Shooters
attack.desc: Colt shoots six straight long-range shots out of his revolvers.

ult.name: Bullet Storm
ult.desc: Colt rattles off a massive burst of bullets that shoot extra far and destroy cover.

sp1.name: Slick Boots
sp1.desc: Colt's movement speed is increased by 10%.

sp2.name: Magnum Special
sp2.desc: Colt's attack range and bullet speed are increased by 11%.

Bull.desc: Bull deals massive damage up close with his shotgun. For his Super move, he charges through barriers and knocks back enemies!

attack.name: Double-Barrel
attack.desc: Bull's double-barreled shotgun deals heavy damage. It has very short range, so Bull likes to get up close and personal.

ult.name: Bulldozer
ult.desc: Bull puts his head down and bulldozes through opponents and obstacles. He's always been headstrong!

sp1.name: Berserker
sp1.desc: When Bull falls below 40% health, his reload speed doubles!

sp2.name: Tough Guy
sp2.desc: When Bull falls below 40% health, he gains a shield that reduces all damage he takes by 30%.

Jessie.desc: Jessie's Shock Rifle shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. Her Super deploys a cute but deadly gun turret!

attack.name: Shock Rifle
attack.desc: Jessie fires off an energy orb. After hitting a target, the orb bounces at the next target in range, hitting up to three enemies.

ult.name: Scrappy!
ult.desc: Jessie deploys a gun turret that automatically shoots at enemies. It's made of 100% recycled materials!

sp1.name: Energize
sp1.desc: Jessie can repair her gun turret for 800 of its missing health by zapping it with her attack.

sp2.name: Shocky
sp2.desc: Scrappy the Turret now shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. The orbs' range after a bounce is 51% of normal range.

Brock.desc: Brock fires a long-range, explosive rocket at enemies. His Super is a ballistic rocket barrage that destroys cover!

attack.name: Rockin' Rocket
attack.desc: Brock lets fly with a single Rockin' Rocket that really goes the distance.

ult.name: Rocket Rain
ult.desc: Brock fires a rocket barrage that takes out enemies and obstacles. He only wants to see you bathing in the Rocket Rain!

sp1.name: Incendiary
sp1.desc: The impact of Brock's attack sets the ground on fire. Enemies in the area take 600 damage per second! Lasts for 2 seconds.

sp2.name: Rocket No. Four
sp2.desc: Brock loads a fourth rocket into his launcher, increasing his ammo capacity (and discarding the thermos bottle he's been keeping in his launcher's #4 rube).

Dynamike.desc: Dynamike lobs two explosive sticks of dynamite. His Super attack is a whole barrel full of dynamite that blows up cover!

attack.name: Short Fure
attack.desc: Mike tosses two sticks of dynamite, passing over any obstacles in the way. The fuses are cut as short as Mike's explosive temper!

ult.name: Big Barrel o' Boom
ult.desc: A big-bada-barrel of dynamite blows up cover. Any surviving enemies get knocked back on impact!

sp1.name: Dyna-Jump
sp1.desc: Dynamike can ride the blast wave of his explosives to jump over obstacles!

sp2.name: Demolition
sp2.desc: Adds +1000 damage to Mike's Super.

Bo.desc: Bo fires three explosive arrows toward his targets. His Super ability places a trio of hidden, explosive mines on the ground!

attack.name: Eagle-Eyed
attack.desc: Bo releases a trio of exploding arrows, tearing up enemies like an eagle's talons.

ult.name: Catch a Fox
ult.desc: Bo hides explosive traps in the ground. When triggered by an enemy, the traps explode after a short delay, knocking back and damaging enemies.

sp1.name: Circling Eagle
sp1.desc: Bo spots enemies hidden in bushes from 150% longer distance than normally.

sp2.name: Snare a Bear
sp2.desc: Instead of a knockback, Bo's traps now stun the enemy for 2.0 seconds!

El Primo.desc: El Primo throws a flurry of punches at his enemies. His Super is a leaping elbow drop that deals damage to all caught underneath!

attack.name: Fists of Fury
attack.desc: El Primo fires off a furious flurry of four fiery fists. That's a spicy jalapeno knuckle sandwich!

ult.name: Flying Elbow Drop
ult.desc: Leaping high, El Primo drops an Intergalactic Elbow that knocks around enemies and destroys cover!

sp1.name: El Fuego
sp1.desc: Enemies caught in El Primo's Super will burn for 1200 damage over 4 seconds.

sp2.name: Meteor Rush
sp2.desc: El Primo gains a 25% speed boost for 4.0 seconds after using his Super.

Barley.desc: Barley attacks by lobbing bottles at enemies, doing splash damage. His Super is a huge barrage of burning bottles!

attack.name: Undiluted
attack.desc: Barley lobs a bottle, breaking it on the ground. Enemies take damage from the splash, and more damage over time if they stay in the puddle.

ult.name: Last Call
ult.desc: Barley hurls a flurry of fiery bottles, covering a huge area in flames. This oneâ€™s on the house!

sp1.name: Medical Use
sp1.desc: Barley regains 400 health from each main attack.

sp2.name: Extra Noxious
sp2.desc: Adds +140 damage per second to Barleyâ€™s attack.

Poco.desc: Poco fires damaging sound waves at enemies. His Super can heal both Poco himself and his teammates!

attack.name: Power Chord
attack.desc: Poco strums his guitarrÃ³n, sending forward bone-jarring sound waves. Enemies hit by the waves take damage.

ult.name: Encore
ult.desc: Poco heals himself and all friends he can reach with his uplifting melody. Does not affect enemies.

sp1.name: Da Capo
sp1.desc: When Poco's attack hits friendly Brawlers they now heal for 800 health.

sp2.name: Screeching Solo
sp2.desc: Pocoâ€™s Super now also hits enemies, dealing 800 damage.

Rico.desc: Rico fires a burst of bullets that bounce off walls. His Super burst is a long barrage of bouncy bullets that pierce targets!

attack.name: Bouncy Bullets
attack.desc: Rico's bullets bounce off walls, gaining range. They can hit enemies behind cover.

ult.name: Trick Shot
ult.desc: Rico fires a long burst of bullets that pierce through enemies and bounce off walls, gaining range.

sp1.name: Super Bouncy
sp1.desc: Rico's bullets, from attack and Super alike, get supercharged by their first bounce and deal +100 damage!

sp2.name: Robo Retreat
sp2.desc: When Rico falls below 40% health, he runs 34% faster!

Darryl.desc: Darryl has a powerful double-shotgun attack. His Super move is a reckless roll inside of his bouncy barrel!

attack.name: Double Deuce
attack.desc: Darryl's double barrel shotguns fire two staggered blasts of heavy close-range damage.

ult.name: Barrel Roll
ult.desc: Darryl rolls forward inside his barrel, knocking back enemies and bouncing off walls. His Super recharges over time!

sp1.name: Steel Hoops
sp1.desc: Darryl's Super reinforces his barrel, reducing all damage he takes by 30% for 0.9 seconds.

sp2.name: Rolling Reload
sp2.desc: When Darryl uses his Super, he doubles his reload speed for 5.0 seconds.

Penny.desc: Penny shoots bags of coins, damaging the target and anyone standing behind. Her Super is a mortar-style cannon turret!

attack.name: Plunderbuss
attack.desc: Shoots out a pouch of foolâ€™s gold. If the pouch hits an enemy, it bursts and coins pepper targets behind the first enemy.

ult.name: Old Lobber
ult.desc: Penny sets up her cannon! It can shoot at enemies at a long range, even if they are behind cover.

sp1.name: Last Blast
sp1.desc: When Penny's Cannon is destroyed, it shoots out one last barrage of 4 bombs targeting nearby enemies, each dealing 1680 damage.

sp2.name: Balls of Fire
sp2.desc: Cannonballs from Pennyâ€™s turret set the ground on fire for 3 seconds. Enemies in the burning area take 400 damage per second.

Carl.desc: Carl throws his Pickaxe like a boomerang. His Super is a crazy cart spin that clobbers anyone around him.

attack.name: Pickaxe
attack.desc: Carl throws his Pickaxe like a boomerang. After he catches the returning Pickaxe, he can throw it again.

ult.name: Tailspin
ult.desc: Carl goes into a crazy spin for a few seconds, flailing around and damaging nearby opponents.

sp1.name: Power Throw
sp1.desc: Carl throws his Pickaxe with 13% more speed, allowing it to travel faster and return faster.

sp2.name: Protective Pirouette
sp2.desc: During Carl's Super, all damage he receives is reduced by 40%.

Piper.desc: Piper's sniper shots do more damage the farther they travel. Her Super drops grenades at her feet, while Piper herself leaps away!

attack.name: Gunbrella
attack.desc: Piper fires a sniper shot from the tip of her parasol. The shot gains more oompf the farther it flies!

ult.name: Poppin'
ult.desc: Piper hops away to avoid pushy suitors. She leaves them a lady's favor though: live grenades from her garter!

sp1.name: Ambush
sp1.desc: Piper's attack deals +800 extra damage (at max range) when she's hidden in a bush.

sp2.name: Snappy Sniping
sp2.desc: When Piper hits an enemy with her attack, she reloads 0.3 ammo instantly.

Pam.desc: Pam shoots from the hip, peppering targets with shrapnel. Her Super is a healing turret that restores her and teammates' health!

attack.name: Scrapstorm
attack.desc: Pam sprays a large area with bursts of scrap metal. Safety goggles advised!

ult.name: Mama's Kiss'
ult.desc: Pam's healing turret will fix up her and teammates who stay in its area of effect.

sp1.name: Mama's Hug
sp1.desc: Whenever Pam hits enemies with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for 40 health.

sp2.name: Mama's Squeeze
sp2.desc: Healing turret now also damages enemies for 500 damage per second.

Mortis.desc: Mortis dashes forward with each swing of his shovel. As his Super attack, he sends a cloud of bats to damage enemies and heal himself!

attack.name: Shovel Swings
attack.desc: Mortis dashes forward with a sharp swing of his shovel, creating business opportunities for himself.

ult.name: Life Blood'
ult.desc: Mortis calls forth a swarm of vampire bats that drain the health of his enemies while restoring his. Creepy!

sp1.name: Creepy Harvest
sp1.desc: Mortis reaps the life essence of Brawler he defeats, restoring 1800 of his health.

sp2.name: Coiled Snake
sp2.desc: Mortis gains a Dash Bar! His dash range is increased by 75% when the bar is fully charged. It takes 3.5 seconds for the bar to charge when Mortis has all three dashes ready.

Frank.desc: Frank swings his hammer at enemies, sending a shockwave. His Super is an especially powerful blow that stuns enemies!

attack.name: Hammer Hit
attack.desc: Frank takes a while to wind up his hammer blow, but the hit is so hard it sends a shockwave.

ult.name: Stunning Blow
ult.desc: Frank's greatest hit sends a shockwave that destroys environment and stuns enemies for a while.

sp1.name: Power Grab
sp1.desc: Frank steals the power of a Brawler he defeats, increasing his damage by 50% for 12 seconds!

sp2.name: Sponge
sp2.desc: Frank gains +1100 health.

Tara.desc: Tara's triple tarot card attack pierces through enemies. Her Super is a black hole that sucks in all nearby enemies, causing damage!

attack.name: Triple Tarot
attack.desc: Tara flicks her wrist, snapping off three tarot cards that pierce through enemies. Quite a trick!

ult.name: Gravity
ult.desc: Tara conjures up a mind-boggling gravity well! Enemies in the area of effect get pulled in, crashing together painfully hard.

sp1.name: Black Portal
sp1.desc: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears and attacks her enemies.

sp2.name: Healing Shade
sp2.desc: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears to heal Tara and her teammates.

Spike.desc: Spike throws cactus grenades that send needles flying, and a show-stopping Super: a field of cactus spines that slows down and damages enemies!

attack.name: Needle Grenade
attack.desc: Spike fires off a small cactus that explodes, shooting spikes in different directions.

ult.name: Stick Around!
ult.desc: Spike lobs a thorny grenade. Enemies caught in the blast area take damage and are slowed down.

sp1.name: Fertilize
sp1.desc: After using Super, Spike regenerates 800 health per second by staying in its area of effect.

sp2.name: Curveball
sp2.desc: Spikes from the cactus grenade fly in a curving motion, making it easier to hit targets.

Crow.desc: Crow fires a trio of poisoned daggers. As a Super move he leaps, firing daggers both on jump and on landing!

attack.name: Switchblade
attack.desc: Crow throws a triple threat of daggers. Enemies nicked by the poisoned blades will take damage over time.

ult.name: Swoop
ult.desc: Crow takes to the skies, throwing a ring of poisoned daggers around him both on take-off and landing.

sp1.name: Extra Toxic
sp1.desc: Crow's poison saps the strength of enemies, who deal 20% less damage while poisoned.

sp2.name: Carrion Crow
sp2.desc: Crow deals +120 damage with his attack and Super to targets with 50% or less health.

Leon.desc: Leon shoots a quick salvo of blades at his target. His Super trick is a smoke bomb that makes him invisible for a little while!

attack.name: Spinner Blades
attack.desc: Leon flicks his wrist and fires four Spinner Blades. The blades deal less damage the farther they travel.

ult.name: Smoke Bomb
ult.desc: Leon becomes invisible for 6 seconds. If he attacks, he will be revealed. Enemies close to Leon will be able to spot him.

sp1.name: Smoke Trails
sp1.desc: When Leon uses his Super, he gains a 24% boost to his movement speed for the duration of his invisibility.

sp2.name: Invisiheal
sp2.desc: Leon recovers 1000 health per second while his Super is active.

Gene.desc: Gene uses his magic lamp to shoot a splitting projectile. His super is a magical hand that grabs and pulls enemies close!

attack.name: Smoke Blast
attack.desc: Gene shoots a solid ball of magical smoke from his lamp. If the ball doesn't hit a target, it splits up and spreads the damage in a cone.

ult.name: Magic Hand
ult.desc: Gene launches a magical hand from his lamp. If the hand hits an enemy, they get pulled back to Gene's location!

sp1.name: Magic Puffs
sp1.desc: Gene heals all friendly Brawlers around him for 400 health per second.

sp2.name: Spirit Slap
sp2.desc: When Gene's Super is fully charged he does +300 damage with his attack.

Tick.desc: Tick is a metal ball of barely controlled excitement and energy - explosive energy! He throws mines, and his Super makes his head detach, seek a target and explode.

attack.name: Minimines
attack.desc: Tick lobs a cluster of mines that separate before landing. The mines explode on contact with a target, or after a few seconds.

ult.name: Headfirst
ult.desc: Tick detaches and launches his head. After landing, the head hops toward the nearest target and explodes on contact!

sp1.name: Well Oiled
sp1.desc: When Tick takes no damage and doesn't attack, he starts recovering health 2.0 seconds faster than normal.

sp2.name: Automa-Tick Reload
sp2.desc: Tick's reload time is 10% shorter.
